description: Students explore life in the German-speaking countries through reading, discussing, and retelling narrative texts. The course emphasizes vocabulary building, a thorough review of German grammar, and the composition of short narratives to develop writing skills for paragraph-length discourse. Taught in German with some grammar explanations in English. Offered annually in the fall semester. Does not count toward German major or concentration.Prerequisite: GERM 112 or by placement test.
name: Intermed German I
title: Intermediate German I
